subscription.title: Subscribe to functional services
subscription.subTitle: You can subscribe to the store operating needs to subscribe to the subscription, and the cost will be merged in the periodic bill.

basic.title: basic functions
basic.subTitle: Some functions will be in accordance with the use of the system, if the fee will be adjusted in advance, you don't have to worry about being charged under unknowing conditions.

start.title: Subscription function
start.warn: You can cancel the renewal at any time

content.0: You can still use functionality to
content.1: And please feel free to renew

affiliate.title: Summary promotion management
affiliate.desc: You can establish promotional activities for different partners, and track multiple activities and product sales conditions, greatly reduce activity management and settlement costs, making product promotion easier.

start.title: Summary promotion management
start.content: It is automatically tracked through the joint promotion management, and the results are more accurate, making marketing decisions more accurate.
start.price: Fees will be merged in the next bill

feature.title: Subscribe, you can enjoy a grant function service

success.title: Successful subscription promotion activities and gum

stop.title: Determine whether to cancel the subscription promotion activities and humid?
stop.name: Promote cooperation and related pages
stop.content: We will keep relevant information until you subscribe again.

analytics.title: Statistical Analysis
analytics.desc: Provide statistical indicators such as store orders, commodity sales, average customer price â‹¯.

webTrack.title: Advertising analysis
webTrack.desc: You can use data analysis and advertisement and GA and GA, and to track customer browsing behavior with MeepShop analysis tools to assist you with subsequent accurate ad polles.

bulkdiscount.title: Order full discount
bulkdiscount.desc: When the customer consumes the specified amount or the number of goods, the order discount is given, and thereby attracting customers to increase the purchase item, improve the store revenue, for example: the anniversary of the whole house is full of 3,000 folds 1 hundred.

freeGift.title: Order full gift
freeGift.desc: When the order consumption reaches the specified amount or the number of goods, the gift will be delivered to promote the purchase expectations.

freeShipping.title: Free shipping
freeShipping.desc: When the order meets the designated conditions, you will enjoy free shipping, encourage customers to purchase more products.

tagDiscount.title: Full discount
tagDiscount.desc: Specific product consumption is a special threshold to enjoy the discount, which prompted customers to purchase more types of products, such as 2,000 folds over 2,000 folds in autumn and winter, and 5 fold.

productDiscount.title: Commercial discount
productDiscount.desc: You can give discounts for all or specific items, enhance customer purchase desires.

groupDiscount.title: Product selected
groupDiscount.desc: You can use the community or group commodities in groups, provide a combination sales offer, or add gifts, such as: swimsuit + covering and then send waterproof bag, 3 pieces of summer products, 8% discount on shopping bags.

points.title: Shopping
points.desc: Send shopping in a specific situation, increasing the cause of customers back to shop shopping, effectively improving the repo rate and the membership adhesion, such as: new member gives shopping, the birthday of birthday is 3 hundred.

coupon.title: Promo Code
coupon.desc: Give discounts for specific items or complete orders, enhance customer purchase will.

newsletters.title: Member Newsletter
newsletters.desc: Regularly send an electronic newspaper and customers to maintain interaction, which can significantly increase the return rate and significantly reduce advertising cost spending, such as letters such as new listings, discounts.

memberGroup.title: Member group
memberGroup.desc: You can set the condition to automatically grade the members, and provide exclusive offers at the level, and encourage new members to join while consolidating customer brand loyalty, such as 10% discount on VIP all-year consumption.

memberGroupCode.title: Special code
memberGroupCode.desc: You can give special code for relational enterprises or cooperation users, and customers who use special code registration will automatically be included in the designated member group, so that you can follow up.

productMassUpdate.title: Commodity update
productMassUpdate.desc: Provide batch to change product number, pricing, recommended price, price, inventory, cost, product bar code, etc., assist you more efficiently editing product information.

productAuthority.title: Product browsing permission
productAuthority.desc: To set up browsing permissions for the commodity, you can make a restricted browsing and purchase for different membership groups to help you easily develop membership qualifications, such as the New Year's blessing bag only provides VIP purchase.
